subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Three weeks after sustaining a concussion, Lindsey Vonn of the U.S. won a downhill race Saturday for the 40th World Cup victory of her career.
snippet: Three weeks after sustaining a concussion, Lindsey Vonn of the U.S. won a downhill race Saturday for the 40th World Cup victory of her career.
